title: I wanna play with Riot
body: Right now I am at 999 wins and 999 losses, and I was hoping to play with Riot for what would be either my 1000th win or loss and then for my 2000th game, I am quite proficient with Azir and for that reason I would like to play mid, please upvote this so it can reach Riot.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KsyNu0fl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-26T05:02:03.205+0000)
>
> Add me in game!

Hey I sent a friend request to you as I just recently got 1000 wins? Would you mind adding me? IGN: MrKillerKow
Allll hail the rito God, can i add u 2 :3
I'm still waiting for a game with riot :C

Good luck on yo Win.
Excluding my dominion wins I have about 50 games to fo before my 1000 Win/Loss

We won! 

Also Sephyre, you play a great Thresh, ty for the triple. :)

I believed.
And you won.
*Believe in the heart of the cards*
Can I add you Oh Great one?

I will also like to participate in this 1000 win (Don't let it be a loss)
Mind if I add you as well?

Just as I posted something a rioters comes into play.
"Speak of the devil and he shall come"
Where did those Riot Community Games go :(

> [{quoted}](name=PhantomiZer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KsyNu0fl,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-26T11:24:20.451+0000)
>
> Where did those Riot Community Games go :(

Riot wasn't part of the community since they became an actual game company
lol

Everyone wants to play with riot, I want too just so I can get a feel for what our OCE rioters are like.
Are they nice guys? or are they horrible people, I would like to know who runs the game that we all love and play.
